expo.name: Safe&Sound
expo.description: Safe and Sound is a Covid-19 related user visits and associates tracking system. This is a Beta version, please install the Expo Go application in android to launch the application. IOS application is still don't have a Beta version. Since this is a Beta version, there might be unknown bugs. We apologize for that and please make sure to inform us about the bug through our communication channel at Gitter.
